long_description: The REI Flash 22 Pack combines an ultralight design with comfortable touches for your day on the trail. Lightly padded stretch-mesh shoulder straps move freely. Mesh back is soft and breathable; back pad is removable to make pack even lighter. Hipbelt and sternum strap can also be detached; sternum-strap buckle doubles as a safety whistle. Organization features include a zippered lid pocket and an interior zippered pocket to secure keys and other small items. Hydration-compatible design has a hose exit port and an internal sleeve to hold a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Large mesh side pockets can stash bottles and other trail essentials. The REI Flash 22 Pack also has 2 daisy chains that let you attach items on the front.
short_description: The REI Flash 22 Pack combines an ultralight design with comfortable touches for your day on the trail.
